input_text:
Job Title: GC Pharmaceutical Scientist - Team Lead

Location: Sugar Land, TX

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Analyst, Information Technology, Research

Description:
Company Description

Eurofins Scientific is an international life sciences company, providing a unique range of analytical testing services to clients across multiple industries, to make life and our environment safer, healthier and more sustainable. From the food you eat, to the water you drink, to the medicines you rely on, Eurofins works with the biggest companies in the world to ensure the products they supply are safe, their ingredients are authentic and labelling is accurate.

We are looking for an experienced and dynamic leader to support the analytical testing activities to support our clients manufacturing site in Sugarland Texas.

Job Description

Job Responsibilities:

Perform testing of raw materials, in-process product, finished product, and stability of products through wet chemistry and instrumental analysis. (HPLC, GC, Karl Fisher, UV, titration etc.)Perform analytical method validation.Prepare lab-related control documents to include Test Methods (TM), Raw Materials Acceptance (RMA), Bulk and Finished Product Specifications (SPC), Product Stability Specifications (STA), Calibration Test Methods (CTM), Technical Support (TS), Protocols and Reports, Method Transfer/Validation documents.Provide support (training, documentation review, etc.) to other chemists as needed.Initiate and close ELN records when necessary and appropriateLaboratory and equipment maintenance


Qualifications

Minimum Qualifications:

Bachelor's degree in chemistry or related science discipline with 2+ years industry BioPharma/Clinical laboratory experience and strong leadership skillsExperience in the pharmaceutical industry is required.At least 2 years of GC experienceIndustry experience with HPLCAuthorization to work in United States indefinitely without restriction or sponsorship.


Additional Information

Position is full-time, Monday to Friday 8:00am - 5:00pm. Candidates currently living within a commutable distance of Sugar Land, Texas are encouraged to apply.

What We Offer

Comprehensive medical coverage, with dental and vision optionsLife and disability insurancePaid holidays and vacation.


Eurofins Lancaster Laboratories Professional Scientific Services® (PSS) is a global, award-winning insourcing solution that places our people at our clients’ site dedicated to running and managing laboratory services while eliminating headcount, co-employment and project-management worries

Eurofins is a M/F, Disabled, and Veteran Equal Employment Opportunity and Affirmative Action employer.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level

Provide support to other chemists as needed.
